lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: the internet + a good idea + people, passion and cash = a great way to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I run The Footprints Network, an online philanthropy project that harnesses the collective power of micro-donations made on the back of online transactions to fund development projects.   We are one of the many organisations that want to end poverty within our generation.

lenders.name: Dr. Dream

lenders.occupational_info: I am an International Speaker, Author and Holistic Healing Practitioner.  I support others in the Creation, Attraction and Manifestation of their Dreams into their Realities.

lenders.name: Micha
lenders.loan_because:
I'm a convinced liberal and as a member of a liberal party in The Netherlands I find it very importent that people will develop themselves to become living a better life.
Allmost every western country has a specific budget for development. In many cases this money will not reach the people where it is needed for. Therefor I find this a very good initiative. As an individual I can first of all choose my own project and secondly the money will go to that person to start her/his business to get a better life.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am working as an Account Manager (small business) for the Rabobank
Key Accountabilities / Activities:
To relationship manage a portfolio of small business customers by meeting the total banking needs of the customer, both personal and business. The portfolio will primarily contain small business customers whose business needs are generally straightforward. Typical small businesses managed at this level would include: small to medium sized agriculture operations; small to medium sized franchises; businesses with one or two locations; many professionals and small trades. Meet the personal needs of these small business customers, which may range from simple to complex, by profiling, referring, promoting, selling, cross-selling, up selling and delivering a full range of personal banking products and services, including several sophisticated products.

I make sure that the objectives of companies are served by IT rather than the other way around.  This ensures that the IT budget is kept in check and employees are more productive.

lenders.name: Claus Moeller
lenders.loan_because:
There are many good reasons for lending. We especially loan to buy water buffaloes. A water buffalo can lead a poor family out of poverty and give them a chance for a brighter future filled with hope and free from hunger. The animal provides draft power for planting rice and potatoes, milk for protein, and manure for fertilizer and fuel. 
A family can plant four times more rice with a water buffalo than by hand. 
The animal can haul heavy loads to market, where the sale of extra produce brings needed income for clothing, medicine, and school.

lenders.loan_because: I have little, but I am grateful for what I have.  My faith teaches me that everything given will be returned sevenfold, but 98% is fine with me!

I am an artisan and will be offering my creations at my website soon.

lenders.name: UNITED PHOTO PRESS
lenders.occupational_info: UNITED PHOTO PRESS is a photographic agency of great diversity and distinction owned by its photographer members, in Europe and Brasil. With powerful individual vision, United photographers chronicle the world and interpret its peoples, events, issues and personalities. The UPP library is a living archive updated daily with across the globe. You may search or browse our 10000,000+ images which are available online for licensing in a variety of formats. Keep up to date with our events, exhibitions, features, books and news.

lenders.name: Alexandre
lenders.loan_because:
-- The Starfish Story --

A young man is walking along the ocean and sees a beach on which thousands and thousands of starfish have washed ashore. Further along he sees an old man, walking slowly and stopping often, picking up one starfish after another and tossing each one gently into the ocean. 

"Why are you throwing starfish into the ocean?," he asks.

"Because the sun is up and the tide is going out and if I don't throw them further in they will die."

"But, old man, don't you realize there are miles and miles of beach and starfish all along it! You can't possibly save them all, you can't even save one-tenth of them. In fact, even if you work all day, your efforts won't make any difference at all."

The old man listened calmly and then bent down to pick up another starfish and gently tossed it into the sea. "It made a difference to that one."
lenders.occupational_info: Wireless Telecom Engineer
